Texts.Eng: Also, if metal people exist...why is not advanced? Should be super-people, but still using iron weapons. Even Fenerox changed to steel past 4 generations! How is metal-men having ships and space jump? Can metal-men be pets? Would be useful for clean burrows, since never sleeping.

Met impossible thing. Metal that talks. Kirhos said other people made metal-people and metal people just not remembering. We have many thinks about this, and are wonder: How is metal men baby-making? No flesh parts, no eggs, no sex? Where is babies? How is making more?
Metal cannot talk. Why is this metal talk.
